column2: UPDATE 1-American Airlines merger settlement approved by U.S. judge April 25 A federal judge on Friday approved the November settlement between the U.S. government and the airlines that merged to form American Airlines Group
CORRECTED-Chevron wins a round in U.S. suit against lawyer in Ecuador case NEW YORK
column3: April 25A federal judge on Friday rejected a bid by a U.S. lawyer to stall the enforcement of a ruling that found he used fraud to secure a $9.5 billion pollution judgment against Chevron Corp in Ecuador.
